featured.text: However, why a dream will take a certain symbolic form is still a mystery.
Dancers used small reed hoops as symbolic representations of animals such as eagles or snakes.
With very rapid movements, they used the hoops to construct the symbolic forms around their bodies.

definition.zh_def: 象徵性的，代表某種意義或概念的。
definition.en_def: Serving as a symbol; representing something else.
definition.example: The dove is a symbolic representation of peace.
